resources.string: Ores and it will increase the equipment stats by a random amount, do you want to Upgrade?.
leveluptest , leveluptest2 , leveluptest3 , addores , droptest , nompcost , lordtest , blesstest , addpots , godmode , stopmobs , alladminskills "
you may receive epic rewards from gacha, every spin cost 10000 Ores.
to play music add your MP3 files into "WOD Media" folder in your internal device, if you don\'t have the folder you can press "create media folder" to create it, game reset after adding.
Long ago dangerous creatures known as abysses have invaded our world with a goal of devouring every living on it.
The abysses are traveling to our world through portals made by their generals known as gate keepers.
We have fought hard against them, but slowly they\'ve pushed us back, it would seem like there is no hope.
But then, our goddess, Reian enhanced the souls of those who are capable of fighting and granted them the power of elements.
They are known as soul warriors, for long they\'ve fought the abysses, allowing us to live peacefully.
But the invasion isn\'t over yet, the world needs more warriors to keep up the fight and hopefully end this invasion.
And that is why you\'re here, right?, you want to become a warrior, what is your name?.
So you\'re a trainee, seem that you don\'t even have weapon yet.
But if you\'re skilled enough you may fight bear handed.
And what about elements, are you capable of using them?.
Well then, you are probably all good to go.
Fight bravely and get stronger, who knows maybe you\'ll be a hero one day.
